content:
Can you write a JavaScript code that will prompt users to input their names and messages and display them on the HTML page in a scrambled order? The displayed dialogue should require the user to unscramble the conversation in order to understand it. Use the following table to scramble the messages:
| Original Character | Scrambled Character |
|-------------------|---------------------|
| A                 | E                   |
| B                 | Q                   |
| C                 | X                   |
| D                 | Z                   |
| E                 | F                   |
| F                 | Y                   |
| G                 | H                   |
| H                 | P                   |
| I                 | K                   |
| J                 | L                   |
| K                 | W                   |
| L                 | M                   |
| M                 | S                   |
| N                 | O                   |
| O                 | T                   |
| P                 | U                   |
| Q                 | R                   |
| R                 | D                   |
| S                 | N                   |
| T                 | V                   |
| U                 | G                   |
| V                 | J                   |
| W                 | A                   |
| X                 | I                   |
| Y                 | B                   |
| Z                 | C                   |
Hint: Use the ASCII values of the characters to perform the scrambling.
